description: Minimal number of Catalan numbers that sum to n.
links: Olivier Gérard (first 1001 terms) & Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16796
prog: (Scheme, with memoization macro definec from Antti Karttunen's IntSeq-library)(definec (A014420 n) (if (zero? n) n (+ 1 (A014420 (- n (A081290 n))))));; Other version, requiring A014418raw given in A014418:(define (A014420 n) (apply + (A014418raw n)));; _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 02 2014
author: _Olivier Gérard_
